data.title: Current local time in Chandigarh, India time zone changes
data.meta_description: Find out current local time in Chandigarh as well as time zone changes and next clock adjustment time. Explore sunrise, sunset, moonrise and moonset time.
data.text:
Current local time in Chandigarh, India

Sunday, August 11, 2024 at 18:50 +05:30

UTC/GMT Offset: +05:30 hours

Time zone: +05:30 - +05:30

Daylight saving: No daylight saving time in 2024

Chandigarh is a city in Union Territory of Chandigarh in India

Put Chandigarh local time onto your personal world clock

What is the best time for call or meeting with someone in Chandigarh?

What's the local time in other places, when it's 6 pm in Chandigarh?

Time Zone & Daylight Saving Time

No daylight saving time used in 2024. Last clock adjustment was made at Sunday, October 14, 1945. See details below.

EventLocal Time or Time ZoneUTC/GMT OffsetDaylight saving time ended:Sunday, October 14, 1945

11:59:59 PM daylight time -> 11:00:00 PM standard time6:30 -> 5:30Current time zone:+05:30 - +05:30+5:30 hours

Sun

The timing of sunrise and sunset is calculated with respect to Chandigarh location as they are observed at sea level. Viewer may notice a few minutes difference depending on actual longitude and latitude, altitude, and local landscape.

Sunrise:

at 05:47 in direction 71° East-northeast

Sunset:

at 19:09 in direction 288° West-northwest

Day length:

13 hours 21 minutes (about 93 seconds shorter than yesterday)

TwilightBeginsEndsCivil twilight:05:2168° East-northeast19:34291° West-northwestNautical twilight:04:5164° East-northeast20:05295° West-northwestAstronomical twilight:04:1959° Northeast by east20:36300° Northwest by west

Moon

Just like for the Sun, moonrise and moonset are computed for Chandigarh location and actual timing may vary with viewer's actual location and altitude. While lunar phases remain constant for any location on Earth and depend only on relative positions of the Earth, Moon and Sun.

Moonrise:

No moonrise observed in Chandigarh today

Moonset:

No moonset observed in Chandigarh today
